message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product.  I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Could you consider meeting me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $10,500 is a tempting offer, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher.  Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?
